anya-e0105n11:1_0: Ayaṁ pana ādito paṭṭhāya sāsanamalabhūtānaṁ adhammavādānaṁ uppatti. Asokarañño hi
anya-e0105n11:1_1: kāle uppabbājetvā nikkaḍḍhitā aññatitthiyā buddhasāsane aladdhapatiṭṭhā kodhābhibhūtā
anya-e0105n11:1_2: pāṭaliputtato nikkhamitvā rājagahasamīpe nālandāyaṁ sannipatitvā evaṁ sammantayiṁsu
anya-e0105n11:1_3: ‘‘mahājanassa buddhasāsane anavagāhatthāya sakyānaṁ dhammavinayo nāsetabbo, tañca
anya-e0105n11:1_4: kho tesaṁ samayaṁ ajānantehi na sakkā kātuṁ, tasmā yena kenaci upāyena punapi tattha
anya-e0105n11:1_5: pabbajitabbamevā’’ti. Te evaṁ sammantayitvā puna āgantvā visuddhattheravādīnamantaraṁ
anya-e0105n11:1_6: pavisituṁ asakkontā tadaññesaṁ sattarasannaṁ mahāsaṅghikādinikāyānaṁ santikaṁ upasaṅkamitvā
anya-e0105n11:1_7: attano aññatitthiyabhāvaṁ ajānāpetvā pabbajitvā piṭakattayamuggaṇhitvā tañca viparivattetvā
anya-e0105n11:1_8: tato kosambiṁ gantvā dhammavinayanāsanāya upāyaṁ mantayitvā 253-buddhavasse chasu
anya-e0105n11:1_9: ṭhānesu vasantā (1) hemavatiko (2) rājagiriko (3) siddhatthiko (4) pubbaseliyo (5)
anya-e0105n11:1_10: aparaseliyo (6) vājiriyo (7) vetullo (8) andhako (9) aññamahāsaṅghikoti nava abhinave
anya-e0105n11:1_11: nikāye uppādesuṁ nikāyasaṅgahe 9-piṭṭhe. Tesaṁ nāmāni ca laddhiyo ca kathāvatthuaṭṭhakathāyaṁ āgatāyeva.
anya-e0105n11:8: Vajirapabbatavāsino vājiriyā (6) gūḷhavinayaṁ nāma ganthaṁ akaṁsu.
anya-e0105n11:9: Teyeva sabbe māyājālatanta-samājatantādike aneke tantaganthe ca, marīcikappa-herambhakappādike aneke kappaganthe ca akaṁsu.
anya-e0105n11:13_0: Tesu pana saddhammapatirūpakesu vetullavādo, vājiriyavādo, ratanakūṭasatthanti imāniyeva
anya-e0105n11:13_1: tīṇi laṅkādīpamupāgatāni, aññāni pana vaṇṇapiṭakādīni jambudīpeyeva nivattantīti
anya-e0105n11:13_2: nikāyasaṅgahe vuttaṁ. Vaṇṇapiṭakādīnampi pana laṅkādīpamupāgatacchāyā dissateva.
anya-e0105n11:14_1: gūḷhavinaya vedallapiṭakāni ettha ‘‘vepulla, vedallaṁ, vetullanti atthako ekaṁ, bodhisattapiṭakasseva
anya-e0105n11:14_2: nāma’’nti veditabbaṁ. tathā hi vuttaṁ asaṅgena nāma ācariyena abhidhammasamuccaye
anya-e0105n11:14_4: bhāsitaṁ. yaduccate vepullaṁ, taṁ vedallamapyuccate, vetullamapyuccate. kimatthaṁ
anya-e0105n11:14_6: kimatthamuccate vedallaṁ? sabbāvaraṇavidalanato. kimatthamuccate vetullaṁ? upamānadhammānaṁ
anya-e0105n11:16: ‘‘Gūḷhavinayaṁ gūḷhavessantaraṁ gūḷhamahosadhaṁ vaṇṇapiṭakaṁ aṅgulimālapiṭakaṁ raṭṭhapālagajjitaṁ āḷavakagajjitaṁ vedallapiṭakanti abuddhavacanaṁ saddhammapatirūpakaṁ nāmā’’ti ca–
anya-e0105n11:17_0: Tesaṁ paṭikkhepo dissati. Na hi tāni asutvā, tesañca atthaṁ ajānitvā sīhaḷaṭṭhakathācariyehi
anya-e0105n11:17_1: tāni paṭikkhipituṁ sakkā, nāpi taṁ paṭikkhepavacanaṁ jambudīpikaṭṭhakathācariyānaṁ
anya-e0105n11:17_2: vacanaṁ bhavituṁ, mahāmahindattherassa sīhaḷadīpaṁ gamanasamaye tesaṁyeva abhāvato.
anya-e0105n11:17_3: Tasmā tāni ca tadaññāni ca mahāyānikapiṭakāni taṁkālikāni yebhuyyena sīhaḷadīpamupāgatānīti
anya-e0105n11:17_4: gahetabbāni. Tesu ca vajjiputtakagaṇapariyāpannassa dhammarucinikāyassa piṭakānaṁ
anya-e0105n11:17_5: tadupāgamanaṁ pubbeva vuttaṁ. Tadaññesaṁ pana tadupāgamanaṁ evaṁ veditabbaṁ.
